attributes.action: Replace the re-application of an SIA license with a renewal system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The SIA currently do not renew a license - they force you to re-apply.  They already have all of our information, and require us to update the details that matter  such as change of name or address. The cost of a license reflects all legal checks etc - so why is re-application necessary rather than a renewal - obviously still paid for?
